taskbody.context: You can access the documents that are related to an operation. The documents can be instruction manuals or technical publications associated with the operation. They have been added to the corresponding product line, equipment, or material using the Route Management module or the ERP system.

step.cmd: In the Work Queue page, select the operation on which you want to work.
step.stepresult: The Documents section appears, providing a list of documents associated with the operation.

step.cmd: Select the document that you want to access.

taskbody.result:
The document appears in the workspace.
You can rotate, download, or print the document.
taskbody.postreq: Perform the operation, and specify the consumption of BOM items for the operation.
